english.segment1: I was sitting in my classroom trying to do my homework. when this girl sat in front of me. She was cute and she was clean off the cover of a magazine. My school girl fantasy. Don't ask me what she's thinking. is she thinking of me. my school girl fantasy. 36-24-36 I'm on the floor with her. Oh if that were true. Want that girl to marry me late at night its her I see. Oh I don't know what to do.
